Fear - Fear can hold people back from achieving their goals and living their lives to the fullest. By removing fear, individuals would be more likely to take risks and pursue their dreams.
Anger - Anger can lead to negative outcomes, such as conflicts and aggression. Removing anger would promote more peaceful and harmonious relationships.
Anxiety - Anxiety can cause unnecessary stress and worry. By removing anxiety, individuals would be more likely to approach life with a sense of calm and confidence.
Boredom - Boredom can lead to a lack of motivation and purpose. Removing boredom would encourage individuals to find new hobbies and activities that bring them fulfillment.
Jealousy - Jealousy can lead to negative feelings and behaviors. By removing jealousy, individuals would be more likely to focus on their own happiness and success.
